headline: Why Datadog (DDOG) Stock Is Down Today
summary: Shares of cloud monitoring platform Datadog (NASDAQ:DDOG) fell 3.1% in the afternoon session after a broad-based sell-off impacted the technology sector.

headline: Is Datadog’s Rebound a Sign of More Growth After Microsoft Azure Partnership?
summary: If you are eyeing Datadog right now, you are not alone. Whether you are sifting through your watchlist or wondering if the recent turbulence is a buying opportunity, Datadog’s trajectory has raised plenty of questions among investors. Over the past week, the stock jumped 9.1%, bouncing back from some volatility that put shares down 6.2% in the last month. Year-to-date, it is still slightly negative at -1.9%. Step back, and the one-year return hits 22.4%. Looking even further back, the pace of...
